1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Ordered relation.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Type.Rel.Order
6  ( -- * Ordering
7    relBodyOrder,
8
9    -- * Portion of list
10    Portion (..),
11    nullPortion,
12    takePortion,
13
14    -- * Portion of relation
15    RelPortion,
16    takeRelPortion,
17  ) where
18
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture              as O
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                  as B
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax                as S
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type.Judge            as T
23
24
25-- ============================================  Ordering
26
27-- | Sort relation body according to order specification.
28relBodyOrder :: (Ord c, T.GetTermNames he) => [S.TermName] -> he -> O.Map [[c]]
29relBodyOrder ns he = edit where
30    edit  = B.sortByName ords $ T.getTermNames he
31    ords  = (B.orderingCap . S.orderingTermName) <$> ns
32
33
34-- ============================================  Portion of list
35
36-- | Portion description.
37data Portion = Portion
38    { portionTop      :: Maybe Int   -- ^ Top /N/ elements.
39    , portionMiddle   :: Maybe Int   -- ^ Middle /N/ elements.
40    , portionBottom   :: Maybe Int   -- ^ Bottom /N/ elements.
41    , portionParts    :: [Int]       -- ^ Indecies of /N/ chunks.
42    , portionPer      :: Maybe Int   -- ^ Divided /N/ chunks.
43    } deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
44
45instance B.Default Portion where
46    def = Portion { portionTop     = Nothing
47                  , portionMiddle  = Nothing
48                  , portionBottom  = Nothing
49                  , portionParts   = []
50                  , portionPer     = Nothing }
51
52-- | Test portion is not effective.
53nullPortion :: O.Test Portion
54nullPortion Portion { portionTop     = Nothing
55                    , portionMiddle  = Nothing
56                    , portionBottom  = Nothing
57                    , portionPer     = Nothing } = True
58nullPortion _ = False
59
60-- | Take portion of list.
61takePortion :: (Ord a) => Portion -> [a] -> [a]
62takePortion p xs = xs' where
63    xs' = B.unique (top p ++ mid p ++ bot p ++ parts p)
64
65    top Portion { portionTop = Just n } = take n xs
66    top _ = []
67
68    mid Portion { portionMiddle = Just n } = B.takeMiddle n xs
69    mid _ = []
70
71    bot Portion { portionBottom = Just n } = B.takeEnd n xs
72    bot _ = []
73
74    parts Portion { portionParts = ps, portionPer = Just n } =
75        concat $ B.takeChunks n ps xs
76    parts _ = []
77
78
79-- ============================================  Portion of relation
80
81-- | Portion description for relation.
82type RelPortion = ([S.TermName], Portion)
83
84-- | Take effective (non-null) portion of relation body.
85takeRelPortion :: (T.GetTermNames he, Ord c) => RelPortion -> he -> [[c]] -> [[c]]
86takeRelPortion (ord, p) he body
87    | nullPortion p  = body
88    | otherwise      = takePortion p $ relBodyOrder ord he body
89
